about_the_game:
Overview

Embark on a dark journey in "Undead Onslaught," a thrilling Bullet Heaven RPG where you don’t just play a game—you become the villain. Break free from the traditional hero narrative and dive into a world where your rise from a nefarious disruptor of peace to the ultimate challenger of the celestial order is just the beginning.

In "Undead Onslaught," experience a unique blend of high-octane bullet-hell action combined with the strategic depth of classic RPGs. Each choice and battle shapes your path through a world filled with formidable foes and breathtaking challenges. Will you harness the dark arts as a Frost Mage with enhanced spell damage and rapid cooldowns, or will you lead a horde of dark minions as a Master Demonologist? The choice is yours.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Class System: Choose from multiple classes, each with unique abilities and stat boosts. Customize your villain’s powers and strategy to suit your playstyle.

  • Hero-Slayer Mechanic: Face off against heroes who grow stronger with each encounter. Defeat them to turn the tides and claim their powers, adding a personal vendetta to your epic story.

  • Onslaught System: The more enemies you slay, the more powerful they become, offering bigger and better rewards!

  • Rich Narrative: Play through a story that defies norms, challenging not just your tactical skills but your moral compass as you ascend from a mere menace to a formidable force against the powers of good.

Design:

"Undead Onslaught" brings your darkest fantasies to life with meticulous detail. From the frost-covered ruins where the Frost Mage weaves his icy spells to the shadowy depths where Necromancers summon the undead, every scene is crafted to keep you engrossed. Experience the thrill of gameplay through vivid animations and effects that showcase the unique mechanics of each class. Whether it's summoning a spectral army or unleashing a barrage of ice shards, "Undead Onslaught" offers a visual feast that brings the dark fantasy to life.

name: Undead Onslaught

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS *: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R7 265
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: "Undead Onslaught" is a Bullet Heaven RPG where you ascend as the villain. Master unique mechanics and strategic combat to dominate a dark, evolving world.
supported_languages: English, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, Korean, French, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian
